## New c already aliased

Original PHP:

```php
use Donquixote\CodegenTools\Tests\Fixtures\C;

return new C();
```

Exception:

```php
use Donquixote\CodegenTools\Exception\CodegenException;

throw new CodegenException(
  'Cannot aliasify code that already contains imports.',
);
```

Exception:

```php
use Donquixote\CodegenTools\Exception\CodegenException;

throw new CodegenException(
  'Cannot aliasify code that already contains imports.',
);
```
